subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Gael Monfils replaced last year's Australian Open darling Marcos Baghdatis after an up-and-down match in which the talismanic Frenchman used his serve and verve to win over the crowd.
snippet: Gael Monfils replaced last year's Australian Open darling Marcos Baghdatis after an up-and-down match in which the talismanic Frenchman used his serve and verve to win over the crowd.
